OwnerUser.AboutMe: Computational linguistics student at University of Washington. I've just got a lot of interests. I think functional programming is great, but I appreciate the traditional languages because of $. I love logic: modal logic, automated reasoning, metalogic, set theory, etc. Sometime soon I'd like to get into some machine learning.

Body: Since nobody has mentioned it, I guess I will. The linguistic study of writing systems in general is orthography. The study of handwritten language would be a part of it. See the Wikipedia article.
